“Timmy! You saved Christmas. I don’t know how I could repay you,” Santa told Timmy.

“Don’t mention it. It was the least I could do to make up for my mistake,” Timmy said as he grabbed his lower belly as much as he could.

“Timmy, you did such a great job, I do have a reward for you. I want to retire and pass on the red hat and suit to you,” Santa said with a grin to the not so little boy.

“You WHAT?!” Timmy said in shock and nervousness. Yes, he wanted to keep on eating and get bigger. But to become the new Santa? That would be a lot for the kid to handle.

“Think about it Timmy. You would gain some magic powers possibly from it. Not to mention most of your time would be filled with some of your favorite things like eating and video games. Better than school, right?” Santa said with a nudge.

Timmy started to think about it. Rocking out a new outfit would be fine, but he had to think if this is what he wanted to do for the rest of his life...

To show you our appreciation, we’d like to invite you and your fairy godparents to come and stay at Fairy world while we give you nothing but respect and admiration and even whatever food you want to eat.” He then threw away the note cards and asked the buck toothed boy “So, do you accept or not? Either way, I don’t really care.”

1231.content:
It was another average day at the Turner household. Both of Timmy’s parents were off doing something else while Vicky baby sat Timmy. Suddenly Timmy ran right into his room and quickly boarded it up because Vicky was in a bad mood today and she wanted to take her anger out on the buck toothed boy. Cosmo and Wanda then used their magic to put an invisible barrier in front of the door so Vicky can’t get in there.

“Man, why do Mom and Dad leave me with this monster?!?” Timmy screamed in fear. “I may be dumb, but I can tell when someone doesn’t care about another person.” Cosmo said as if he dealt with this situation before. Wanda glared at her husband and said “Yeah, saying that will definitely make Timmy feel better.” Timmy then had an idea “No, Cosmo is right this time.” The two fairies then stood there in shock. “I am?” Cosmo asked with Wanda following up by saying “He is?”

“I mean, it’s kinda obvious that they don’t want to be around me. So you know what? I wish my parents would take better care of me!” Timmy exclaimed. His fairy godparents then lifted their wands and *POOF! A few seconds went by and suddenly the doorbell rang. Vicky answered it and Mr. and Mrs. Turner were standing in the doorway. “Oh you’re back already?” Vicky asked. Timmy’s Dad then replied “Yes, and we realized you’re a horrible babysitter and we’re firing you!” Vicky was shocked and kind of furious “WHAT?!?” Before she could try to reason with them, Timmy’s Dad picked her up and tossed her out of the house.

Timmy’s bedroom door was broken by his parents who held him like they never have before. “Oh, we’re so sorry for leaving you with that monster!” Timmy’s Mom cried out. “And to make it up to you, we’re going to treat you like you’re the best kid in the world!” Timmy’s Dad added. They then took Timmy downstairs to the kitchen and made him a huge meal that took up the entire table. Timmy was astonished at how fast they did it. Not only that, but everything looked delicious! “I could get used to this.” Timmy said to himself. So it went on like this every day since then, where Timmy would get loads of food and he’d eat it all.

1311.content:
Timmy Turner was depressed.
Vicky still didn't love him and he felt she would never love him.

Wanda and Cosmos tried to cheer him up by granting him fun exciting wishes but nothing worked.
Timmy mostly just wanted to spend all day in bed watching TV and being alone.
He had only one thing to keep him comfort...food....

All he ever did was wish up more and more junk food to eat stuffing his face full with fried chicken burgers cakes ice cream and soda.
At first Timmy just ate to comfort himself but he quickly became addicted as the food make him feel better so he just kept on eating.

Weeks of eating had its affects on the poor kid as his belly grew out into a nice plump round tummy with fat rolls.
He grew two big round moobs that filled out his pink shirt.
His skinny arms and legs became plump and soft.
His backside plumped up with two big round butt cheeks that filled his pants.
And his face became rounder with large cheeks and two chins.

Timmy was becoming a sad little fatty and it was only getting worse as time passed and....
1311.title: Sad fat boy

choices: Magic in the food started making him bigger.
He does this everyday for a week to a month
Something else happens
1312.content:
It was summer time in Dimmsdale and Timmy Turner had absolutely nothing to do. All of his friends were at camp and his parents couldn’t afford it for him. He had no games to play, nothing was happening outside, and Timmy was bored out of his mind. The only bright side to this was that he didn’t have to deal with Vicky babysitting him. Timmy was just laying on his bed wondering what he would do.

He then heard his stomach growl. He figured he might as well pass the time by eating. Plus since he has fairies, he could have any kind of food or any amount of food he wanted just as long as he finished eating before his parents noticed. “Cosmo! Wanda!” Timmy shouted but not too loud. His fairy godparents then came in with a POOF! “What’s up sport?” Wanda asked with Cosmo adding “What kinda wish do you wanna make now? You wanna go an a space adventure? Or maybe you wanna go into another Crimson Chin comic?” Timmy then surprised his fairies by answering “Nah, I just want some food.” Cosmo and Wanda then looked at each other with confusion.

“Really? That’s it?” Wanda asked wondering if there’s some kind of catch. “I just want a big pile of food.” Timmy firmly said. “How big?” Wanda asked being very suspicious. “Just big enough for me to jump into, like a pile of leaves.” Timmy replied. Cosmo and Wanda then poofed up a huge pile of random food. There were some pizza boxes, bags of burgers and fries, a few donuts, and other random desserts and such. Timmy finally snapped out of his bored phase and dove right into his pile. He started chowing down on everything in sight. After a few minutes, Timmy then looked up and said “Man, I should do this more often!”
1312.title: Boredom Strikes and Eating Solves it

info.brief_description: Weight Gain story based on Timmy Turner from the Fairly Odd Parents. Idea from DemonGod18
info.description:
In this story, Timmy Turner from the Fairly Odd Parents is put in a situation where he gains weight.

Rules:
ONLY Timmy gains weight.
Any methods are allowed, and he can get as big as you want.
OOC is allowed as long as there are other options provided.
No popping!
Other related fetishes and nsfw stuff allowed at the discretion of Expansion K.
Chapters with poor grammar or inaccuracies to the show are subject to deletion.
